com.fxgraph.cells

Interface CellGestures.DragNodeSupplier

  • Enclosing class:
    CellGestures

    static interface CellGestures.DragNodeSupplier
    Any draggable cell handle must implement this interface.
    Author:
    sirolf2009, ogallagher (javadoc)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javafx.scene.Node apply(Graph graph, javafx.scene.layout.Region region, CellGestures.Wrapper<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> wrappedEvent)
      Defines how to apply a mouse event to a graph node cell.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        javafx.scene.Node apply(Graph graph,
                        javafx.scene.layout.Region region,
                        CellGestures.Wrapper<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> wrappedEvent)
        Defines how to apply a mouse event to a graph node cell.
        Parameters:
        graph - The graph to which the cell belongs.
        region - The cell's graphic (gui representation).
        wrappedEvent - A wrapped MouseEvent instance.
        Returns:
